result.html: Is ise údar an leabhairShe is the book's author.
result.ponchtml: Is ise údar an leaḃairShe is the book's author.

result.eng: It was she who turned us and our faith into a laughing stock!
result.ga: Ise a rinne ceap magaidh dínne agus dár gcreideamh
result.orig: Ise a rinne ceap magaidh dínne agus dár gcreideamh
result.html: Ise a rinne ceap magaidh dínne agus dár gcreideamhIt was she who turned us and our faith into a laughing stock!
result.ponchtml: Ise a rinne ceap magaiḋ dínne agus dár gcreideaṁIt was she who turned us and our faith into a laughing stock!
